name: PHVS_BirthDefectsLateralityatDiagnosis_HL7
title: Birth Defects Laterality at Diagnosis (HL7)
description: Code for the side of a paired organ, or the side of the body on which the reportable Birth Defect(s) is present.

concept.display: Bilateral involvement of both paired organs
Condition is in a paired organ but the laterality of the condition is unknown
Condition is not in a paired organ
The condition is in a paired organ within the left organ
The condition is in a paired organ within the right organ.
Unilateral involvement but side is unknown
